Articles.Content: So, during playing NFS undercover, the computer shut itself down. this happened again a few days later. and today, playing 18 WOS convoy, it shut itself off again. Id think that nfs undercover could be overheating, but 18 wos convoy? its hardly "intensive" ive played games like ksp (runs bad on my pc) fsx, orbiter 2010, sims2, TM forever, yet none of them have this problem. help? maybe too much dust collected?
